title: Elbow Grease Washing Up Liquid | Power Degreaser - Soap for Hand Washing Dishes, Pots, Pans & Glasses (Lemon, 600ml)
features: POWER DEGREASER: Designed with powerful degreasing agents, this washing up liquid cuts through stubborn grease with ease. Perfect after fry-ups, roast dinners or baking sessions, it leaves cookware and dishes brilliantly clean every time.
GENEROUS LONG-LASTING 600ML BOTTLE: Each bottle provides plenty of washes, perfect for busy kitchens and large households. A small squeeze goes a long way, saving both time and effort with every use.

5 UPLIFTING SCENTS: Available in a variety of refreshing and seasonal scents including Lemon, Grapefruit, Apple, Apple & Cinnamon, and Gingerbread. Each fragrance adds a burst of freshness to your home.

LEAVES DISHES SPARKLING: Delivers a spotless, streak-free finish with no residue. Whether scrubbing casserole dishes or handwashing wine glasses, it leaves kitchenware gleaming and fresh with every rinse.

MULTI SURFACES USE: Perfect for use on pots, pans, cutlery, glasses, and crockery, delivering a thorough clean every time. Whether cleaning up after baking or rinsing lunchboxes, it performs beautifully.
QUICK & EASY CLEANING: Simply add a small amount to warm water and watch the bubbles form instantly. Ideal for home kitchens, office sinks, and even caravans or campsites.

FAMILY-FRIENDLY FORMULA: Gentle on hands yet strong on grime, it’s ideal for everyday dishwashing in busy households. Great for cleaning everything from baby bottles and mugs to cooking pans and chopping boards.

TRUSTED HOUSEHOLD NAME: Elbow Grease is a go-to brand for powerful, affordable cleaning products that deliver real results. Loved by homes across the UK, it brings confidence to every clean, from kitchens to bathrooms and beyond.

COMPLETE CLEANING RANGE: From degreasers and sprays to cloths and washing up liquid, the Elbow Grease range covers every surface. Whether deep cleaning or daily tidying, there's an Elbow Grease product designed to make each job easier.

SEASONAL SCENT OPTIONS: Enjoy comforting seasonal favourites like Gingerbread or Apple & Cinnamon during colder months. These limited-edition fragrances bring warmth and festive charm to your kitchen.
description: Product Description Bring joy back to the kitchen sink with Elbow Grease Washing Up Liquid – a tough yet delightfully scented dish soap designed to cut through grease and grime in seconds. This hardworking formula is made for everyday use, removing stubborn food residue from plates, pans, and glassware without the need for scrubbing. Whether tackling last night’s lasagne tray or freshening up your finest wine glasses, it leaves everything brilliantly clean and sparkling. Each 600ml bottle is packed with power and fragrance. Choose from zingy Lemon, crisp Apple, juicy Grapefruit, or seasonal favourites like warming Gingerbread and Apple & Cinnamon. Perfect for use in any washing up bowl or sink, this washing up liquid brings a boost of freshness and shine to your daily cleaning routine. Part of the trusted Elbow Grease range of cleaning products, it’s the ideal choice for busy homes that don’t compromise on results or scent. From everyday washing up, wiping down hobs to cleaning worktops - there are so many uses around the kitchen. Ingredients 15 to 30% Anionic Surfactants, <5% Non-Ionic Surfactants, EDTA, Parfum, Limonene, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone. Directions Add sparingly to a sink with warm running water. Not suitable for use on clothing or fabrics. Manufacturer Contact Information Elbow Grease Original (Lemon) Washing Up Liquid 600ml See more
